item.title: EP 212 - The Anti-Reptilian Alien Cult Murder
item.itunes:title: The Anti-Reptilian Alien Cult Murder
item.description:
Today we track down Sonic to learn the truth! Then we go to court to hear some horrible allegations involving a beloved voice actor! And finally, we start our investigation into the mystery of Sherry Shriner. Did her teachings of reptile interlopers taking over the planet result in a murder?

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FvvZaBf9QQI

 

‘Winnie the Pooh’ Disney Voice Star Jim Cummings Accused of Rape, Animal Abuse

https://theblast.com/disney-winnie-pooh-jim-cummings-rape-animal-abuse-custody/

 

Jim Cummings

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Cummings

 

Steve Mineo - That *itch Killed Me!!!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IuQkw0x_Pmo&feature=youtu.be&t=17m37s

 

Woman accused of being ‘possessed by a reptile’ on trial for killing her boyfriend

https://www.heraldsun.com/news/nation-world/national/article228429769.html

 

Alien reptile internet 'cult' played central role in N.J. man's death

https://www.nj.com/bergen/2017/07/alien_reptile_internet_cult_played_central_role_in_nj_mans_death.html

 

 

Girlfriend arrested after man dies in shooting

https://fox56.com/news/local/girlfriend-arrested-after-man-dies-in-shooting

 

Guilty Verdict Reached in Rogers Trial

https://www.pahomepage.com/news/guilty-verdict-reached-in-rogers-trial/1887375217

 

Police: Poconos woman kills boyfriend after spat with reptilian cult

https://www.mcall.com/news/breaking/mc-pol-reptile-cult-07172017-story.html
